content:
It sounds like you're really making your new space feel like home! I'm so happy to hear that you're enjoying your new area rug, lamp, and succulent. It's amazing how small touches like those can make a big difference in the overall feel of a room.

I'm particularly glad to hear that Sprout is thriving in your kitchen! Succulents are such low-maintenance plants, but they can bring so much joy and freshness to a space. It's great that you're taking care of Sprout and watching it grow.

It's also wonderful that you're taking the time to appreciate the little things in your new space, like the cozy atmosphere created by your new area rug and the improved reading experience with your new lamp. Those small pleasures can really make a big difference in our daily lives.

Remember to take care of yourself as you continue to settle into your new space, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more advice or just want to chat about your new adventures!
